title: Write the happiest story you can write using only four words? - Quora

response.answer_text: My compilation of four word stories. Written just as they came to my mind. Bookseller's book is published.Before : 120 kg, After : 70 kgBrave dog foils robbery.Phone falls; call received.Finally, she said Yes.She likes me too.Call him for tea. (Typical sentence from parents when you say you love someone)Moving to own house.Started working for Google.Mom, I reached safely.Mom, I love you. (Child when mom buys his/her favourite candy )Great, I am selected.India : World Football Champion.Very Happy 100th Birthday.India becomes a superpower.India wins an Oscar.Best mates get married.Completed my first Marathon.Doctor said, it's curable.Life on Mars possible.I am an entrepreneur. (The joy of success after several failed startups)Postman : Money order Aaya Hai. (The money order has arrived)10th Anniversary; she conceived.Gaon me Bijli Aayee. (Electricity is a reality in the village)Look, He/She is walking. (The child started to walk for the first time)Breathed his/her last. (The journey of moksha started)He listened, She spoke.Hurricane over, no casualty.First trip; visa approved.Business is good now.Good days are back.Your upvotes are powerful.

It’s bit difficult and different from what I write …but I would always love to give it a try… “This isn't the end.” (The boy said after failing in his board exam).“I am with you.” (Said the 80 years old husband to his 76 years old wife when the family was planning a trip without them).“I still love you.” (Said the girl to her ex lover when they met after years at friend's wedding.He loved her too).“You are still beautiful.” (Her husband confessed to her after she became victim of acid attack).“Let’s give it a try.” (When 22 years old son tried to teach his dad how to drive a car).“You are my life.” (Said the single mother to her adopted daughter when she thought she is just an unfortunate child).“Can I have your number?” (He asked his crush when they met in the garden after 50 years of their college pass out).“I still believe in love.” (Said 25 years old daughter looking at her parents love after she had gone through her 3rd breakup).“Your eyes are mesmerizing.” (Said a deaf lover to his blind lover).“And … I chose myself.” (Said a mother to his son,who had now divorced with her husband. Her son had asked about her best advise for life .)Thanks for reading … feel free to give opinions…
